"Welcome to 4MATH! 

This app has 3 educational games that you can play to make you better at math! 

If you are a 4MATH veteran, you can press the 'Skip' button below. Otherwise, press 'Next' to continue to more instructions!

"Multiple Choice is a super fun math activity that shows you a math problem and gives you 4 options to pick from to select the correct answer. \n\nClick 'Next' to continue, or click 'Skip' to skip to the login page!"
"Fill in the Blank shows you a math problem but instead you fill in the blank with your answer! Super fun!\n\nClick 'Next' to continue, or click 'Skip' to skip to the login page!"

"Solve the Grid displays a fun matching game where you match the math expression with the answer! Once you create a match, the tiles will disappear like magic! \n\nClick 'Next' to continue, or click 'Skip' to skip to the login page!"
"Each game has its own difficulty! You can do Easy Mode to get the hang of things, Medium Mode to test yourself, and Master Mode to show you've mastered the art of math!"
